name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Futemax Onl - Football style for chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change the New tab background to a football style. Bring the spirit of sports to your Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Futemax - Football style for chrome is a browser extension for Google Chrome that allows users to customize the look and feel of the new tab page with a football theme. This extension replaces the default generic or blank new tab page with background images, logos, player images, and eye-catching and sleek soccer-inspired styling. Users can tweak aspects of the theme to their preferences, adjust background opacity/color scheme, and toggle add-ons on the page. With a combination of aesthetic modifications and functional perks, the Futemax Onl - Football style offers a beautiful browsing experience for football fans.
